biotools.summary: CarrotOmics is an integrated web-based relational database, developed to house and integrate genomic, genetic and breeding data for carrot and related species. CarrotOmics includes genome assemblies, annotated transcripts, traits, maps, and markers being generated and used by carrot researchers.
